infos.value: Your Highness, foreign intruders have been spotted at the border.
Actually...it appears to be King Oelde of Leonis, with Prince Mont in his company.
It seems Hourne and Fennes have formed an alliance and invaded their kingdom.
So they have come to request our assistance, have they?
Without so much as paying me the courtesy of sending a messenger in advance.
King Khury, if I may. Assisting King Oelde now would make him indebted to us.
And if a war with Hourne looms over the horizon, we must begin preparations.
I am of the same mind, Your Highness.
Y-Your Highness... I have one more item to report.
There appears to be a knight of Hourne in King Oelde's company.
He is consorting with a knight of Hourne!?
Yes, Your Highness. It is believed to be Schuzelt, First Sword of «Solidus».
...Serjes. Take your men and move out.
